text:
Seriously, we're leaving 
in five minutes.

Okay, well that's exactly how 
long it takes me to get ready.

To the first Friday night 
in our first London house.
Wooo! Yes!

This girl is my childhood 
sweetheart.
Birdy?
Jesus Christ!
Hi.

Why do you have so many 
tiny towels?

They're not tiny towels, 
they're face cloths.
Who's it from?
Who do you think?
Birdy's got a boyfriend.
Nothing will change, Maggie.
That's only a thing people say
when everything's changing.

You have always been my 
most important person.

I don't know if we should be 
that to each other anymore.
We're in this grubby,
golden phase of life that is so short lived.
Sorry I want to live before I die.
